channel.title: Hugo on Systems Management Squad
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Systems Management Squad

item.title: How to add an author to SysManSquad
item.description: It’s so easy! All you have to do is know everything about Hugo and the various ways it can be abused! Fork us On github, create a fork of https://github.com/SysManSquad/sysmansquadblogdev, replace the URL below with the correct URL for your fork: Be sure and run the git commands below before running a hugo server or it will cause you all kinds of trouble. 1 2 3 git clone https://github.com/SysManSquad/sysmansquadblogdev git submodule init git submodule update This will download the site code and theme to your computer.
